Sweeper is the ultimate productivity tool for busy people who want to stay focused and accomplish their goals. The app is designed to help you stay on task and avoid distractions, so you can make the most of your time and achieve your dreams. Whether you’re a student, a freelancer, or a business professional, Sweeper can help you stay productive and focused throughout the day.

With Sweeper, you can:
• Block distracting websites: Sweeper lets you block any website that distracts you from your work.
• Schedule your activity time: You can not only choose which websites to block, but also set a maximum time limit, and even schedule when to block them.
• Receive notifications: Sweeper can send you notifications to help you stay on track. You can set schedule notifications for approaching deadlines.

At Sweeper, we’re dedicated to helping you stay focused and productive. We believe that with the right tools and mindset, anyone can achieve their goals and make their dreams a reality.
